text: Münsingen (, Bernese German: Münsige) is a town and municipality in the administrative district of Bern-Mittelland in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. On 1 January 2013, the former municipality of Trimstein merged into the municipality of Münsingen and On 1 January 2017, the former municipality of Tägertschi merged into the municipality of Münsingen. The municipality lies on the River Aare between the cities of Bern and Thun. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Cities in Switzerland Category:Municipalities in Bern-Mittelland
title: Münsingen
